overview: Waxing nostalgic about the bittersweet passage from childhood to puberty, four childhood girlfriends — Teeny, Chrissy, Samantha and Roberta — recall the magical summer of 1970. During their walk down memory lane, they reconcile experiences with boys, secrets, bullies and more.
tagline: In every woman there is the girl she left behind.
cast: Christina Ricci|Rosie O'Donnell|Thora Birch|Melanie Griffith|Gaby Hoffmann
